title: Great value and location of this Downtown Boutique hotel.
text: This hotel is located within 3 blocks of Union Square. The front desk staff was very helpful. The rooms were clean. The continenial breakfast just outside the room was very convienent. Some of the rooms have a very small bathroom (ours did) but we didn't find this to be a problem. Loved the quaint antique elevator. The evening complinentary glass of wine was also very nice and helped to interact with other guests in the hotel. Really enjoyed our stay.
